sentence.Network_en: I can vividly remember the feeling of panic.
sentence.Network_cn: 我能清楚地记起那种恐慌感。

sentence.Network_en: The museum collection vividly portrays the heritage of 200 years of canals.
sentence.Network_cn: 博物馆的藏品让运河200年的历史再现眼前.

sentence.Network_en: The book vividly depicts French society of the 1930 s.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书生动地描绘了20世纪30年代的法国社会.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... achiever n. 获胜者 vividly ad. 生动地， 逼真地 vivid a. 生动的， 逼真的.
初中英语重点单词_百度知道 ... conservation v. 保存, 保持 vividly adv. 生动地, 鲜明地 awe n. 敬畏.
单词&nbsp;老友记_我最喜欢向井里_新浪博客 ... tidy up v. 整理, 收拾 vividly 历历在目 do a little mingling 去交际一下.
找翻译的_爱问知识人 ... 普遍看法 general opinions 形象地 vividly 大二下学期 the second term of sophomore.

list.abs: he was deluded , vividly hallucinated , and unable to give any coherent history .他迷妄，有生动的幻觉，并且不能说出连贯的病历。
Lynette : because I vividly remember yesterday andtduring it .丽奈特：因为我清楚地记得昨天。
做事灵活怎么翻译？_百度知道 ... 灵活性 to work properly 机智灵活 vividly tactful 十分灵活 very vivid.
跃_百度百科 ... 跃迁【 transition】 跃然【 appear vividly】 跃然纸上【 show in the writing】.

entry.tran: （记忆、描述等）生动的,逼真的,清晰的
entry.def: If you describe memories and descriptions as vivid, you mean that they are very clear and detailed.

example.ex: People of my generation who lived through World War II have vivid memories of confusion and incompetence...
example.tran: 我们这一代经历过二战的人都真切地记得当时的迷惘和无助。

example.ex: On Wednesday night  I had a very vivid dream which really upset me.
example.tran: 周三晚上，我做了个十分逼真的梦，让我很不安。

entry.def: Something that is vivid is very bright in colour.

auth_sentence.content: Other significant life episodes remain vividly in my memory.
auth_sentence.res_content: Other significant life episodes remain vividly in my memory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Other significant life episodes remain vividly in my memory.

auth_sentence.content: I vividly remember my last stab at sporting glory.
auth_sentence.res_content: I vividly remember my last stab at sporting glory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I vividly remember my last stab at sporting glory.

auth_sentence.content: They also remembered the end of each experience most vividly.
auth_sentence.res_content: They also remembered the end of each experience most vividly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They also remembered the end of each experience most vividly.

means.word_mean: 生动地;逼真地;鲜明地;活泼地

sentences.en: She related the whole story vividly.
sentences.cn: 她栩栩如生地把整个情况都讲了。

sentences.en: The book vividly depicts French society of the 1930s.
sentences.cn: 这本书生动地描绘了20 世纪30 年代的法国社会。

sentences.en: The characters in the book are vividly presented.
sentences.cn: 这本书里的人物写得栩栩如生。

sentences.en: The museum collection vividly portrays the heritage of 200 years of canals.
sentences.cn: 博物馆的藏品让运河200 年的历史再现眼前。
